Hi,

I have posted to the html5 WG mail list asking for PUT and DELETE to b=
e 
included as acceptable <form> method values, to avoid needing to use 
Xm=
lHttpRequest from browser UAs (and for more graceful functional 
degradatio=
n in the face of disabled JavaScript).

See http://lists.w3.org/Archives/Pu=
blic/public-html/2007May/0917.html

Others on this list may wish to express=
